hints.content:
$\blueD{750}$ is the smallest whole number that rounds to $800$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A vertical number line labeled 700 to 900 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 700, 750, 800, and 900 are labeled. The tick mark for 750 is blue. !

hints.content:
$\blueD{849}$ is the greatest whole number that rounds to $800$.

[[☃ image 1]]

So, any whole number from $\blueD{750}$ to $\blueD{849}$ rounds to $800$.

options.alt: A vertical number line labeled 700 to 900 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 700, 750, 800, 849, and 900 are labeled. The tick marks for 750 and 849 are blue. !

A vertical number line labeled 700 to 900 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 700, 750, 800, 849, and 900 are labeled. The tick marks for 750 and 849 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 750 to the tick mark at 849. !

question.content:
**Which number line highlights all whole numbers that round to $800$ if we are rounding to the nearest hundred?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A vertical number line labeled 700 to 900 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 700, 750, 800, 850, and 900 are labeled. The tick marks for 750 and 850 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 750 to the tick mark at 850.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ce6149a30d21844fb5c160ca7d04ede8e29773bb)

![A vertical number line labeled 700 to 900 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 700, 750, 800, 849, and 900 are labeled. The tick marks for 750 and 849 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 750 to the tick mark at 849.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8c67ca844d66086daa7b4998826bc9ca2e9e1b21)

![A vertical number line labeled 700 to 900 with tick marks at every 10 units. The tick marks at 700, 800, and 900 are labeled. The tick marks for 800 and 900 are blue. A blue line runs along the vertical number line from the tick mark at 800 to the tick mark at 900.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/980fd2c157de5212b4ee1f205647192a41540f18)
